body_html: @michaelisard My understanding was that we're deprecating tf.train.Supervisor and encouraging people to move to the tf.train.FooSession classes, so any features would be added here. Sherry and/or Mustafa are the respective owners for these.
body_text: @michaelisard My understanding was that we're deprecating tf.train.Supervisor and encouraging people to move to the tf.train.FooSession classes, so any features would be added here. Sherry and/or Mustafa are the respective owners for these.
body: @michaelisard My understanding was that we're deprecating `tf.train.Supervisor` and encouraging people to move to the `tf.train.FooSession` classes, so any features would be added here. Sherry and/or Mustafa are the respective owners for these.
